item.title: Output Strings in Lowercase -- UNIX
item.description: This is something I found on someone else’s blog which i find useful, its always the simple things you forget. # cat uppercasefile | tr "[:upper:]" "[:lower:]" this file’s contents are in uppercase but its output should be lowercased # tr "[:upper:]" "[:lower:]" < uppercasefile this file’s contents are in uppercase but its output should be lowercased # cat uppercase | tr '[A-Z]' '[a-z]' this file’s contents are in uppercase
